reviews.review:
A real classic...
And also nice to get some achievement!!!

10/10
Шедевр
Muito Bom!

I expect most people are in the know, but Portal is the quinetessential puzzle game.

Portal relies on the main character (Chel), and her ability to use a portal gun to warp between two points. The mechanic is simple, fun, and adequatly challenging.  

Beyond what you would expect from a puzzle game, Portal brings to the table great dialouge and narrative in the form of GLADOS, the facility's A.I. whose snark and constant taunting bring an unparrelled level of life to the game.  

Portal isn't a long game, but the overal quality and a few extras more than make up for that.  

On the whole Portal is one of those games that you really need to find time to play.

8/10

Muy buen juego
Es muy divertido y te pone a prueba con grandes desafios.

Picked up this game on sale, expected a game I could enjoy for a few hours.

This game was soo much more than that, this game was FANTASTIC. If I knew how good this game was I woulda picked it up waaay sooner. 10/10 

Not only does it have incredible gameplay, it has challenging/interesting puzzles, an amazing ending and boss fight and the credits after beating the boss was good aswell, a perfect song that actually made me really happy. 

The game is fairly short, about 5-6 hours main story if you solve the puzzles quickly like I did, but it does come with bonus missions and puzzles so theres a few hours there aswell. Its definitely worth the money. This is a game I would definitely replay. 

Don't have Portal yet? Pick it up or miss out on a fantastic game, your choice.
El mejor juego

Gra polega na rozwiązyaniu zagadek logicznych, zwanych testami, przy użyciu tytułowych portali. Chell - główna bohaterka - dostaje do użytku Portal Gun, potrafiący rzucić dwa portale na specjalnie do tego przeznaczone powierzchnie. Działają one na zasadzie "co pierwszym wleci, drugim wyleci", a więc można ich użyć np. do przemieszczania się po planszy. Gra nie jest bardzo skomplikowana fabularnie, aczkolwiek (zwłaszcza w połączeniu z sequelem) kreuje sensowny i szczegółowy świat.

Plusy:
+ Gra pełna zagadek wymagających logicznego myślenia
+ Bardzo dobrze wykonana mechanika działania portali
+ Różnorodność w mechanikach zagadek
+ Bardzo dobra grafika (Gra wydana w 2007 r.)
+ Spolszczenie gry w formie ładnie wyglądających, czytelnych napisów
+ Oprócz głównej historii gracz ma dostęp do wyzwań oraz poziomów zaawansowanych. Wyzwania to zagadki znane z fabuły gry, które gracz ma przejść w jeden ze sposobów:
a) używając jak najmniejszej ilości portali
b) robiąc jak namniej kroków
c) w jak najkrótszym czasie
W zależności od wykonania, przyznawane są stopnie: Złoty, Srebrny oraz Brązowy.
Poziomy zaawansowane to utrudnione wersje zagadek z kampanii.

Minusy:
- Długość gry (2-3 godziny trwa główna historia)

Gra według mnie jest warta swojej ceny. Razem z nią polecam kupić kontynuację - Portala 2, który doskonale rozwija historię oraz zdradza więcej o świecie gry.

its an old legend that now costs less than a bag of chips

9/10
This is an amazing game

Brilliant, simply brilliant.

The machanic is simple and complex. As we know it from Valve Games the gameplay is simple to learn but hard to perfect.
The Story is short but great, if you want to play for many hours there are still both, the advanded and the challange maps.

For everyone who enjoys the slow pace of a puzzle game, who loves a good stroy, who likes to be challanged.

A different type of first person game, the story only makes you want more and game play is fluid. Running on the source engine makes it playable even on older computers while keeping graphics on high. Only thing I would change is that the game doesn't feel long enough, but portal two has already fixed that. :)
Научился мыслить порталами, спасибо.
Good game. Pretty Creepy tho But i definetly recommend

Great game, but too short (1 or 2 hours to finish).

If you like it definitely play the second!
Amazing if you havent gotten it yet you're dumb, sorry.

Portal is a bit hard to review, but I'll try. Starting with the gameplay, I'd have to say this is as close as we'll get to a perfect game. Never a bug or glitch, well optomized, good writing, interesting concept, short but never lacking, well balanced difficulty, it is an example of what gaming should always be.

Now by no means is this game my favorite ever (I dont love puzzle games as a genre) but I've played it over twice, and loved it equally both times.

This was my first Valve game, and one of my first steam games, and it will forever hold a special place in my heart, it is the benchmark on which I rate my games, and I will never forget how special the first playthrough of this game was.
=======
10/10, there is no reason not to buy it

Short game but very entertaining. Probably not worth the $10 normal price, but for $0.99 or the protal bundle for < $3 you cannot go wrong. The story line took me about 2 hours of playing in a couple sessions but was never boring once. Would reccommend this to anyone who might want to give it a shot and enjoy puzzle games.

This is one of the more interesting first-person puzzle games I have played in  while. The gameplay is tight, challenging, and methodical. The music, voice work, and writing are very funny the first time around. The only complaint I have about this game, was the fandom surrounding it. Portal is great, it is not perfect, but it is deffinately one game you should buy for it's well time jokes, unique mechanics, and well done platforming.

Es un juego muy entretenido, bastante. Pero a la vez, corto  pase la historia principal en 3 horas y despues te dan un par de misiones avanzadas para seguir dando vueltas. Una experiencia muy recomendada, pero es preferible comprarlo en oferta, digamos por lo corto que es y aprovechar las horas/$$. Lo pague 0.74 USD pero ni empedo, lo pagaria 7.5 USD, no me mal entiendan es un juego genial y lo recomiendo pero son muy pocas horas para pagar por ese precio siendo que si me guardo esa plata en las ofertas de invierno verano compro uno por 5 o 6 y tengo muchas mas horas.
Bardzo dobra gra komputerowa polecam

Portal, Un juego de puzzles y a pesar de que te puedas atascar una  que otra vez rapidamente daras con la solución.
Mecanicamente divertido, una historia muy interesante y un personaje inolvidalble, el modo "historia" da para 5 horitas y puedes tener más completando mapas extra y completando logros que no son muchos.
Recomendado.

I absolutely recommend this game. Portal combines physics with a unique trial and error storyline. The game itself is rather short, but it makes up for it in its post-game advanced chambers and challenges. It's definitely worth giving a go; you won't regret it.

神作無誤。
相對於現在的遊戲來說，沒有華麗的畫面或特效，
但卻有難度適中的謎題和詭譎的劇情。

以解謎遊戲來說，難度適中，解法都是有跡可循的，
沒有那種不看攻略就幾乎絕對無法解開的關卡，趣味性和成就感兼具。

以恐怖遊戲來說，
沒有昏暗的畫面、沒有嚇人的怪物、沒有任何jump scares、沒有嚇人的場景，
但單純的白色牆壁卻能帶來宛如置身精神病房般的壓迫感，
機器人只能發出冰冷的機械語音，卻能說出高度社會化的內容，帶來細膩的恐怖谷效應。
一切彷彿公事公辦但又冷酷無情，兼帶著如絲如縷般的惡意讓玩家細細發覺。
One of the best games I've ever played. 10/10. Would recommend

It was an excellent release to fill The Orange Box. Valve chose the ideal student concept to convert into Source Engine and add unique visuals. But, perhaps even more importantly, they added GLaDOS, a very unique main character that really made the game stand out with the humour and personality. Overall, the game is short and sweet, but more importantly, an excellent demo for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198121797462/recommended/620]Portal 2[/url], the actual game.
great game
打折入手，关卡设计十分精妙，背后剧情虽短，可是也很有感触。唯一遗憾的一点就是过关模式有点单一。喜欢解密类型的，推荐入手。
Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei, ótima atmosfera e os puzzles são bons.
流程较短，快的话大概4小时足够通关 ，但出色的剧情与游戏关卡弥补了 这一缺陷，推荐打折时入手，原价买略不合算，但总体上是十分出色的作品。

Atualmente, já tendo visto todo o potencial que a proposta de Portal possui, e como a alcaçou em Portal 2, o jogo original da franquia fica meio passado e incompleto (alguns diriam até que Portal 1 é um Alpha ou Beta version do produto final que seria Portal 2, com seus features multiplayer e Steam Workshops que multiplicam infinitamente as horas de jogo possíveis). Dito isso, minha avalição é neutra.
Recomendo se você tiver jogado Portal 2 e estiver curioso para saber do passado de GLaDOS e a protagonista (tendo em conta que a campanha dura apenas 3 horas) ou simplesmente for um fã da franquia e suas mecânicas e tiver a curiosidade de ver com seus próprio olhos como elas evoluíram. Fora isso, é um jogo curte sem muito a oferecer, ainda mais se comparado com toda a completude de sua sequência.

Em suma: aos fãs da franquia, esperem uma daquelas promoções bacanas que a Steam sempre faz para adquirir o jogo (o comprei por R$5,00) e matar a curiosidade (como fiz); aos novatos que desejam conhecer esse Puzzle-shooter maravilhoso de quebrar a cabeça, comprem o Portal 2.
